trans-unit.source: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Choose the price plan you need
trans-unit.target: Choose the price plan you need

trans-unit.source: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Manage pricing and quota for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: [Pricing][pricing] for [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] is based on data volume per application.
trans-unit.target: [Pricing][pricing] for [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] is based on data volume per application.

trans-unit.source: There's a substantial Free tier in which you get most of the features with some limitations.
trans-unit.target: There's a substantial Free tier in which you get most of the features with some limitations.

trans-unit.source: Each Application Insights resource is charged as a separate service, and contributes to the bill for your subscription to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Each Application Insights resource is charged as a separate service, and contributes to the bill for your subscription to Azure.

trans-unit.source: [See the pricing scheme][pricing].
trans-unit.target: [See the pricing scheme][pricing].

trans-unit.source: Review quota and price plan for your Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Review quota and price plan for your Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: You can open the Quota + Pricing blade from your application resource's Settings.
trans-unit.target: You can open the Quota + Pricing blade from your application resource's Settings.

trans-unit.source: Choose Settings, Quota + pricing.
trans-unit.target: Choose Settings, Quota + pricing.

trans-unit.source: Your choice of pricing scheme affects:
trans-unit.target: Your choice of pricing scheme affects:

trans-unit.source: [Monthly Quota](#monthly-quota) - the amount of telemetry you can analyze each month.
trans-unit.target: [Monthly Quota](#monthly-quota) - the amount of telemetry you can analyze each month.

trans-unit.source: [Data rate](#data-rate) - the maximum rate at which data from your app can be processed.
trans-unit.target: [Data rate](#data-rate) - the maximum rate at which data from your app can be processed.

trans-unit.source: [Retention](#data-retention) - how long data is kept in the Application Insights portal for you to view.
trans-unit.target: [Retention](#data-retention) - how long data is kept in the Application Insights portal for you to view.

trans-unit.source: [Continuous export](#continuous-export) - whether you can export data to other tools and services.
trans-unit.target: [Continuous export](#continuous-export) - whether you can export data to other tools and services.

trans-unit.source: These limits are set separately for each Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: These limits are set separately for each Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Free Premium trial
trans-unit.target: Free Premium trial

trans-unit.source: When you first create a new Application Insights resource, it starts in the Free tier.
trans-unit.target: When you first create a new Application Insights resource, it starts in the Free tier.

trans-unit.source: At any time, you can switch to the 30 day free Premium trial.
trans-unit.target: At any time, you can switch to the 30 day free Premium trial.

trans-unit.source: This gives you the benefits of the Premium tier.
trans-unit.target: This gives you the benefits of the Premium tier.

trans-unit.source: After 30 days, it will automatically revert to whatever tier you were in before - unless you explicitly choose another tier.
trans-unit.target: After 30 days, it will automatically revert to whatever tier you were in before - unless you explicitly choose another tier.

trans-unit.source: You select the tier you'd like at any time during the trial period, but you'll still get the free trial until the end of the 30-day period.
trans-unit.target: You select the tier you'd like at any time during the trial period, but you'll still get the free trial until the end of the 30-day period.

trans-unit.source: Monthly Quota
trans-unit.target: Monthly Quota

trans-unit.source: In each calendar month, your application can send up to a specified quantity of telemetry to Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: In each calendar month, your application can send up to a specified quantity of telemetry to Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: See the [pricing scheme][pricing] for the actual numbers.
trans-unit.target: See the [pricing scheme][pricing] for the actual numbers.

trans-unit.source: The quota depends on the pricing tier that you have chosen.
trans-unit.target: The quota depends on the pricing tier that you have chosen.

trans-unit.source: The quota is counted from midnight UTC on the first day of each month.
trans-unit.target: The quota is counted from midnight UTC on the first day of each month.

trans-unit.source: The Data points chart shows how much of your quota has been used up this month.
trans-unit.target: The Data points chart shows how much of your quota has been used up this month.

trans-unit.source: The quota is measured in *data points.* A single data point is a call to one of the Track methods, whether called explicitly in your code, or by one of the standard telemetry modules.
trans-unit.target: The quota is measured in *data points.* A single data point is a call to one of the Track methods, whether called explicitly in your code, or by one of the standard telemetry modules.

trans-unit.source: Data points include:
trans-unit.target: Data points include:

trans-unit.source: Each row you see in [diagnostic search](app-insights-diagnostic-search.md).
trans-unit.target: Each row you see in [diagnostic search](app-insights-diagnostic-search.md).

trans-unit.source: Each raw measurement of a [metric](app-insights-metrics-explorer.md) such as a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: Each raw measurement of a [metric](app-insights-metrics-explorer.md) such as a performance counter.

trans-unit.source: (The points you see on the charts are usually aggregates of multiple raw data points.)
trans-unit.target: (The points you see on the charts are usually aggregates of multiple raw data points.)

trans-unit.source: Each point on the [web test (availability)](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) charts.
trans-unit.target: Each point on the [web test (availability)](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) charts.

trans-unit.source: *Session data* is not counted in the quota.
trans-unit.target: *Session data* is not counted in the quota.

trans-unit.source: This includes counts of users, sessions, environment and device data.
trans-unit.target: This includes counts of users, sessions, environment and device data.

trans-unit.source: Overage
trans-unit.target: Overage

trans-unit.source: If your application sends more than the monthly quota, you can:
trans-unit.target: If your application sends more than the monthly quota, you can:

trans-unit.source: Pay for additional data.
trans-unit.target: Pay for additional data.

trans-unit.source: See the [pricing scheme][pricing] for details.
trans-unit.target: See the [pricing scheme][pricing] for details.

trans-unit.source: You can choose this option in advance.
trans-unit.target: You can choose this option in advance.

trans-unit.source: This option isn't available in the Free pricing tier.
trans-unit.target: This option isn't available in the Free pricing tier.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade your pricing tier.
trans-unit.target: Upgrade your pricing tier.

trans-unit.source: Do nothing.
trans-unit.target: Do nothing.

trans-unit.source: Session data will continue to be recorded, but other data will not appear in diagnostic search or in metrics explorer.
trans-unit.target: Session data will continue to be recorded, but other data will not appear in diagnostic search or in metrics explorer.

trans-unit.source: How much data am I sending?
trans-unit.target: How much data am I sending?

trans-unit.source: The chart at the bottom of the pricing blade shows your application's data point volume, grouped by data point type.
trans-unit.target: The chart at the bottom of the pricing blade shows your application's data point volume, grouped by data point type.

trans-unit.source: (You can also create this chart in Metric Explorer.)
trans-unit.target: (You can also create this chart in Metric Explorer.)

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the pricing blade
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the pricing blade

trans-unit.source: Click the chart for more detail, or drag across it and click (+) for the detail of a time range.
trans-unit.target: Click the chart for more detail, or drag across it and click (+) for the detail of a time range.

trans-unit.source: Data rate
trans-unit.target: Data rate

trans-unit.source: In addition to the monthly quota, there are throttling limits on the data rate.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the monthly quota, there are throttling limits on the data rate.

trans-unit.source: For the free [pricing tier][pricing] the limit is 200 data points/second averaged over 5 minutes and for the paid tiers it is 500/s averaged over 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: For the free [pricing tier][pricing] the limit is 200 data points/second averaged over 5 minutes and for the paid tiers it is 500/s averaged over 1 minute.

trans-unit.source: There are three buckets which are counted separately:
trans-unit.target: There are three buckets which are counted separately:

trans-unit.source: [TrackTrace calls](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-trace) and [captured logs](app-insights-asp-net-trace-logs.md)
trans-unit.target: [TrackTrace calls](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-trace) and [captured logs](app-insights-asp-net-trace-logs.md)

trans-unit.source: [Exceptions](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-exception), limited to 50 points/s.
trans-unit.target: [Exceptions](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-exception), limited to 50 points/s.

trans-unit.source: All other telemetry (page views, sessions, requests, dependencies, metrics, custom events, web test results).
trans-unit.target: All other telemetry (page views, sessions, requests, dependencies, metrics, custom events, web test results).

trans-unit.source: If your app sends more than the limit, some of the data is dropped.
trans-unit.target: If your app sends more than the limit, some of the data is dropped.

trans-unit.source: You'll see a notification warning that this has happened.
trans-unit.target: You'll see a notification warning that this has happened.

trans-unit.source: Tips for reducing your data rate
trans-unit.target: Tips for reducing your data rate

trans-unit.source: If you encounter the throttling limits, here are some things you can do:
trans-unit.target: If you encounter the throttling limits, here are some things you can do:

trans-unit.source: Switch off collection modules you don't need by [editing ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md).
trans-unit.target: Switch off collection modules you don't need by [editing ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md).

trans-unit.source: For example, you might decide that performance counters or dependency data are inessential.
trans-unit.target: For example, you might decide that performance counters or dependency data are inessential.

trans-unit.source: Pre-aggregate metrics.
trans-unit.target: Pre-aggregate metrics.

trans-unit.source: If you have put calls to TrackMetric in your app, you can reduce traffic by using the overload that accepts your calculation of the average and standard deviation of a batch of measurements.
trans-unit.target: If you have put calls to TrackMetric in your app, you can reduce traffic by using the overload that accepts your calculation of the average and standard deviation of a batch of measurements.

trans-unit.source: Or you can use a [pre-aggregating package](https://www.myget.org/gallery/applicationinsights-sdk-labs).
trans-unit.target: Or you can use a [pre-aggregating package](https://www.myget.org/gallery/applicationinsights-sdk-labs).

trans-unit.source: Name limits
trans-unit.target: Name limits

trans-unit.source: Maximum of 200 unique metric names and 200 unique property names for your application.
trans-unit.target: Maximum of 200 unique metric names and 200 unique property names for your application.

trans-unit.source: Metrics include data send via TrackMetric as well as measurements on other data types such as Events.
trans-unit.target: Metrics include data send via TrackMetric as well as measurements on other data types such as Events.

trans-unit.source: [Metrics and property names][api] are global per instrumentation key not scoped to data type.
trans-unit.target: [Metrics and property names][api] are global per instrumentation key not scoped to data type.

trans-unit.source: [Properties][apiproperties] can be used for filtering and group by only while they have less than 100 unique values for each property.
trans-unit.target: [Properties][apiproperties] can be used for filtering and group by only while they have less than 100 unique values for each property.

trans-unit.source: After the unique values exceed 100, the property can still be used for search and filtering but no longer for filters.
trans-unit.target: After the unique values exceed 100, the property can still be used for search and filtering but no longer for filters.

trans-unit.source: Standard properties such as Request Name and Page URL are limited to 1000 unique values per week.
trans-unit.target: Standard properties such as Request Name and Page URL are limited to 1000 unique values per week.

trans-unit.source: After 1000 unique values, additional values are marked as “Other values”.
trans-unit.target: After 1000 unique values, additional values are marked as “Other values”.

trans-unit.source: The original value can still be used for full text search and filtering.
trans-unit.target: The original value can still be used for full text search and filtering.

trans-unit.source: Data retention
trans-unit.target: Data retention

trans-unit.source: Your pricing tier determines how long data is kept in the portal, and therefore how far back you can set the time ranges.
trans-unit.target: Your pricing tier determines how long data is kept in the portal, and therefore how far back you can set the time ranges.

trans-unit.source: Raw data points (that is, instances that you can inspect in Diagnostic Search): between 7 and 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Raw data points (that is, instances that you can inspect in Diagnostic Search): between 7 and 30 days.

trans-unit.source: Aggregated data (that is, counts, averages and other statistical data that you see in Metric Explorer) are retained at a grain of 1 minute for 30 days, and 1 hour or 1 day (depending on type) for at least 13 months.
trans-unit.target: Aggregated data (that is, counts, averages and other statistical data that you see in Metric Explorer) are retained at a grain of 1 minute for 30 days, and 1 hour or 1 day (depending on type) for at least 13 months.

trans-unit.source: Review the bill for your subscription to Azure
trans-unit.target: Review the bill for your subscription to Azure

trans-unit.source: Application Insights charges are added to your Azure bill.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights charges are added to your Azure bill.

trans-unit.source: You can see details of your Azure bill on the Billing section of the Azure portal or in the [Azure Billing Portal](https://account.windowsazure.com/Subscriptions).
trans-unit.target: You can see details of your Azure bill on the Billing section of the Azure portal or in the [Azure Billing Portal](https://account.windowsazure.com/Subscriptions).

trans-unit.source: On the side menu, choose Billing.
trans-unit.target: On the side menu, choose Billing.

trans-unit.source: Limits summary
trans-unit.target: Limits summary

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
